subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Roy Jones Jr. and Felix Trinidad, who have 13 world titles between them, announced yesterday at a news conference that they would fight Jan. 19 at Madison Square Garden. Trinidad, 34, had a 42-2 record before announcing his retirement in 2005. Jones, 38, has a 51-4 career record.
